description:
Since 1969, The Rothenberg Law Firm LLP has secured hundreds of millions of dollars for injured clients. Personal injury law is our sole focus and our passion.

As one of the country’s premier personal injury law firms, we represent injured clients nationwide. The firm has multiple offices in Hackensack, New Jersey, Philadelphia and New York.

Our Mission: Providing Holistic Support And Securing Justice

At The Rothenberg Law Firm, our lawyers and staff are committed to justice. We don’t function as a personal mill, churning out one settlement after another. Instead, we make a significant investment in each case we take on, going the extra mile to fight for maximum compensation.

Our services extend beyond just legal advocacy. We know that dealing with the nightmare of a tragic accident involves many layers of challenges. We strive to help in whatever way we can – for example, by connecting clients with medical providers, financial advisors, counselors and other trusted professionals.

Above all, we treat clients as though they were family. This philosophy, “The Rothenberg Way,” infuses all we do.

Get To Know Us During A Free Consultation

Learn more about what makes us a leading personal injury firm. For a free consultation, call 800-697-9967. There are no upfront costs, and you won’t have to pay any attorney fees unless we obtain compensation for you.
